body:
Hello Rob & Greg,


Thank you for the responses and clarification.


As I understand, community testing/debugging is the main way of validating a Radiance release. It certainly would be nice to have a standard validation procedure (maybe using CMake/CTest) for each Radiance release.


Kind Regards,
Andrei Kolomenski


-----Original Message-----
